1.content: You wake up, shrunken on Summoner's Rift. (un)fortunately, You are soon spotted by a gigantic:
1.title: The beginning of it all.

11.content:
You gulp as a purple skirt swishes above you, followed by a demented giggle that sends shivers down your spine.
"what's this... Do you wanna play too?"

Annie grins and-
11.title: Annie Hatsur.

choices: She starts to plays with you using her feet
You start to run before she does anything
112.content: You slowly back away from this girl as she starts to take her shoes. "Come on lets play!" she says. Something about the way she says this does not comfort you, there is something darker, more sinister in her voice that sends chills down your spine. At this point Annie has fully taken of one of her shoes revealing her bare foot. A smell starts to fill the air, an overpowering stench of her reeking feet. You are stunned by how this girls feet could smell so bad and how unkempt her feet were. They were sweaty and grimy, and obviously haven't been washed in a while. You hear her laugh that unsettling laugh again and. . .
112.title: Kicks off her shoes.

1122.content:
Your nose crinkles up, Twisting in on itself from the obvious stench of this... dark little girl's unwashed feet. Free from their black school shoes, the tops were covered by strange pink-and-purple striped leg warmers, the toes wriggling in delightful anticipation. A loafer rests near you, heat and foot funk radiating out of the hole that once held Annie's bare foot.

You gag a little as Annie giggles above you, stomping a foot down with a wet slump in front of you.

You run like your life depends on it.... because, well, it might.

"Ah ah ah!" You hear the girl say teasingly. With a couple of skips and a hop, she is in front of you again, grinning.

She raises her sole, showing you a soot-coated heel and toes, wiggling them briefly before slamming a big tow down on your lower body, causing you to cry out in pain and surprise.

"Try to run again... and I'll step down on you, hard!" Annie says, finishing the sentence with a dark chuckle. "Or, introduce you to my Teddy, Tibbers....Or both!"

You gulp, taking in the scent of Annie's dirty feet. The stench of hot sweat and toe gunk burns down your nostrils and throat. How could one girl sweat this much?!

Annie :
1122.title: You start to run before she does anything

choices: Annie wants you to lick her shoes clean
11222.content: With you trapped underneath her sole she reaches over and picks up one of her shoes. As she does this she wriggles her toes in your face wiping there sweat and stink onto your body. You just couldn't believe that a little girl could produce so much sweat and such a wretched odor from her feet, you could only fear what she was going to do to you as a black loafer comes into view. You hear Annie give another laugh as she moves her foot off of you and starts to replace it with the shoe. You look up at the insides of the shoe and you are completely shocked at the amount of wear that is shown on the insole. Judging by her age the shoes that Annie has can't be that old, but looking at the insole, there was a deep, dark impression of her foot imprinted on it, the impression was filled with the grime and filth that built up over the repeated wear on the Rift. The sweat that has built up inside starts to pour out onto your body. You were disgusted as this reeking liquid poured from this girls shoes, and all you heard was her laughing at your predicament. The smell that was emanating from Annie's loafer was one that caused your nose to burn with a stench that you were sure would never leave your nose. Your eyes widen at what she then says next. . .
11222.title: Lifts up a fetid shoe.

choices: You're too scared of what she'll do to you - lick!
112221.content:
With a hellish giggle, Annie clenches her damp toes around you and dangles you above the reeking loafer. her pink-and-purple leg warmers brush against the tops of her dirty feet as she gives you a nice, long view of the used up loafer.

"Okay, you gotta lick my shoes clean, okay? " She says enthusiastically before letting go - and gravity seals your fate as you plummet into the swampy hell below. You could not process how a little girl could make such a powerful stench inside these shoes. and she wanted you to lick them clean?? You shift with a wet squelch as the warm sweat pools under you as you depress the insole. dried dirt, grime, toejam, all are present in huge amounts inside the shoe- you couldn't possibly do it right?
112221.title: Annie wants you to lick her shoes clean

choices: under her foot and stuck to her sole as she looks for you.
between her toes and stuck in toejam as she looks for for you.
flying through the air as her foot missed you but you land in one of her shoes.
1123.content: As you back away from this unsettling girl you have this odd feeling come over you, similar to what you felt before ending up here. But you still back away from Annie as she continues smiling at you, but her face then turns into a confused look as she stares at you. At the same time you notice that she was getting bigger every second, but you see that everything else around you is getting bigger as well meaning you are getting smaller. What's worse is that the smell coming from the Annie's feet is getting stronger as you get smaller. After a few more seconds you see the Annie's face turn from confusion to anger. Curious as to why she is angry you then here her say, "Hey, where did you go!?" she asked. If she can't see you that could only mean that you are to small to be seen, you then take in your even larger surroundings and figure you must be the size of a flea now. At first you think its a good thing because Annie can't find you, but on the other hand it means there is more danger than her now. Right before you could figure out what to do now Annie begins walking your direction with her bare feet shaking the ground. Not wanting to be stepped on you begin running away, but unfortunately at your tiny size you don't make it far and soon a shadow created by Annie's foot appears around you. You look up to see the dirty underside of her foot coming down on you. Then her foot lands on you and you now find yourself....
1123.title: Smaller and unseen

11233.content:
You reel as you attempt to get your bearings, seeing the already giant girl grow to a massive size along with all of your other surroundings. You see the grimy toes of the dark child before you go from the size of small cars, to buses, to monoliths as your jaw drops, the smell doubling with each spurt in size.

"Where did you go?!" You hear the little girl whine angrily, gulping as her huge, young sole blocks out the light looming above you like an ocean liner.
It slams into the dirt of the Rift with a terrible amount of force (at your size, anyway.) Shockwaves and the stench of rank little girl feet wash over you in a cloud of dirt, sending you flying like a mite.

You land with a rough rolling, on something that wasn't quite ground. It was wetter.. smoother... softer, but.. the stench was unmistakable. You cower and follow the huge arch of the girl's loafer above, seeing it go on and on. You were in Annie's well used shoe, as well evidenced by the sweat lazily dripping from the black walls and pooling in massive lakes to the far north, where Annie's gargantuan toes had worn their imprints. The crater caused by her skipping into the insole was like an entire city block to you now. And the smell hung in the air like a cheesy, vinegary and.. ashy cloud. You shudder as the booms get louder. Five plush, filthy toes loom over the mouth of the loafer, covered in a striped legwarmer. They wiggle eagerly. "Come out come out, where ever you are!" Annie says in a singing tone, slamming her foot into the shoe.
11233.title: flying through the air as her foot missed you b...

12.content:
It was after a long day on the Rift, Jinx just finished a long day on the Rift and she was definitely tired, and needed a rest. Right before she was about to leave the Rift something caught her eye, this happened to be you, shrunken, confused and stumbling about. You had no idea what had happened to you or why. And things were about to get a lot worse
"So what do you think that is Fishbones?" you here the girl say as she approached you. She bends down and picked you up. "Its a tiny person!" she said with much excitement,
"I know exactly what I am going to do with you!"
You only stood in horror as she reveals that it is. . .
12.title: Jinx

121.content:
Jinx carelessly drops you, and you plummet towards the ground, with a sudden scream of terror. From this height you were certain the fall would horribly kill or maim you! The ground rushed up to you at an alarming speed, but your sheer horror made the fall, which took only a second or two, seem like hours, before you hit the ground. You let out a loud howl of pain, as you smashed into the hard ground. Practically on instinct, you sprung up and spun around to face your tormentor. It was at that moment you realized something odd...

"Hey, what's with that cry?" Jinx laughed down at you. "You don't look thaaat bad."

It was true. Aside from some dust on you, you didn't even see a bruise. Your entire body ached and pain coursed through you, but you didn't seem to be injured! And even the pain was starting to fade.

"Ah, don't worry. If you want to scream so much, I'll give you something to REALLY scream about!" Jinx stated with a psychotic glee in her voice, and lifted her booted foot over your head. Your eyes bulge out of your head, and you turn to run. But a hair too slow. Jinx's boot came stomping down on top of you, crushing you down into the dirt again. This time the pain was even worse, but your attempt to scream in pain again, only awards you a mouthful of dirt. Oh geez.... why? Why, of all the champions did it have to be JINX? Why couldn't it have been someone kind like Karma, or Sona? Hell, you'd have even taken someone like Katarina at this point! Katarina might have thought it more than fun to torture you, but at least she knew how much people could take and when to stop! Jinx was completely insane, and would keep going way past your breaking point.

....Figuratively and literally.

You felt her boot come off of you and suddenly Jinx burst out laughing again. "Haha! I've heard of squashed flat, but now I've really seen it!" She howls, and reaches under you, and picks you up. Your vision is suddenly filled with a mad, violet eye as Jinx examines you closely with glee. Her eye fills your entire vision, but you can imagine the wide, toothy grin on her face. And in her eye you can see your reflection and realize you've LITERALLY been squashed flat. Your body seems to have been compressed to the thinness of paper! How you're still alive you have no idea... But then you see yourself slowly inflate, and a spark of recognition appears in the eye.

"Haha! I think I've got a new toy! Let's see how much you can take!" And then you were falling again, and struck the ground. It still hurt like hell, though now, perhaps because you had the pain of Jinx stomping on you for comparison, it didn't feel QUITE so bad. So long as she didn't stomp on you again.... Oh god. No. No, no, no....

Jinx had taken Pow-Pow off her back and was pointing it right at you. The barrel was right in your tiny face. You unpleasantly noticed you were small enough to FIT down the barrel. Best to keep your mouth shut on that, to avoid giving Jinx more ideas. Then Jinx's finger pulled the trigger, and a bullet as big as you were blasted into you at point blank range. And then another. And another. Bullets blazed into you, and you were certain you were dead, and just hadn't realized it. Your vision swam and then you blacked out from the sheer pain, certain that, as horrible as this experience was at least you wouldn't have to deal with it any longer.

....You awoke an indeterminate time later to a prodding feeling.

"Ugh.... am I in heaven?" You ask woozily. A piercing laugh above you fills your ears. "Awww, you think this is heaven? That's great!" Oh no... Jinx continues to tower over you, that giant grin on her face. "Guess what! Not even Pow-Pow made you go boom! What a bad gun, I'll have to punish him later!" She giggles manically. "I'm so glad my toy is so tough to break!" She lifts her foot up again over you, and this time you realize what was poking you. You wish it could have been her finger, but you weren't so lucky. Jinx had pulled off one of her boots, and the wriggling digits of her foot were undoubtedly what she'd been prodding you with. Your nostrils were filled with the sharpest stink you could have possibly imagined! Then again. Jinx didn't seem much for hygiene. Seriously. Why.... why of why did it have to be her!?

Jinx....
121.title: Smashed. Squashed. And it gets worse.

1212.content:
Jinx, slowly moved one putrid foot towards you, wiggling her, baby blue painted, toes menacingly.
You could only stare blankly, at the putrid instrument of your impending doom, getting closer.

It was not that you body refused to listen to your orders. You had not been paralyzed with fear. Rather there were no orders at all. You could not move shocked by the sudden realization of your powerlessness. You were powerless to escape. Powerless to retaliate. You were powerless!

And worst of all, you had accepted it. The sole thing you could do was... surrender to the soles of the beautiful blue haired psycho, and hope that she would allow you to survive. Though if she did, it would merely be to torment you.

Suddenly the smell of jinx's foot awoke you from your train of thought. Her sole now was a sweaty wall of flesh, right in front of you, so close that, if you leaned forward, you forehead would graze it.

In one swift motion, her toes grasped your head! Gently enough to not crush it, but with enough force to make you yelp in pain. You immediately regretted it. The reeking stench of her footsweat was tenfold worse than the pain. And even worse, you gulped down some sweat. You cringed at the foul taste of it. You wanted to cough, but dared not open your mouth again. Your tongue was burning!

"What should I do with you?" You heard Jinx wonder high above.
After a brief pause, she squealed in excitement .
"I know just the thing tiny guy! You will love it!"

You begged to differ. Not that it did matter. You felt her move her foot, and loosening her grip on your head. Suddenly you were falling downwards, you screamed instinctively, but then you remembered that you had a similar experience a while ago and you had came out unscathed. Indeed your fall was abruptly halted with you pummeling down on a damp surface. Pain was shooting through your whole body, but you were still alive. It seemed that not only you had shrunk, but also had gained some level of invulnerability. Well you'd rather had lost your sense of smell or pain, but at least this meant you had a chance of survival. The flame of hope was rekindling inside of you. If you played along with jinx rules and became her loyal foot licking puppy, you could find an opportunity to escape sometime.

Then suddenly the smell hit you. Never before had you though you could describe a smell as thick, but this was the best word to describe this foul odor. Wondering where you were you looked up to see a circular opening from where light reached down on your smelly prison.
Then it struck you! You knew exactly where you were! Inside jinx's smelly worn out boot. You grimaced as you felt the stench enter your nose lungs and brain.
Terror filled you as you saw Jin'x feet enter the opening of the boot. "I hope you are comfortable down there." You heard Jinx say melodically.
She laughed hysterically as her foot slowly entered the boot. Darkness engulfed you. You felt her toes pass over and the arch of her smelly sole came to rest gently on top of you. The stench of her feet intensified the odor inside her putrid damp boot. You wanted to cry. What had you done to deserve this? And then she began to apply pressure down on you, It hurt like fucking hell. You gritted your teeth, wondering how much longer you could last in there. You heard Jinx mumble something above but you could not hear.

And the she stomped down her foot. You screamed in pain, gulping down gallons of disgusting footsweat. You did not care anymore. Each passing second things were getting even worse, if possible. You were not sure which was the worst part of this torture, the pain or the reek? But definitely it was the most inhumane thing you had ever gone through. There was no escape. Never! Now you fully realized it. There was only serving and worshipping jinx for the rest of your pathetic life.
You open you mouth and let some more footsweat in. It was foul, but if you were going to spend the remaining of your life in it, you might as well get used to it.

And then jinx, began walking. She walk for a long time, with lots of unnecessary stomping and twisting her foot, just to torture you. You did not care anymore. You embraced it all as your new life. You screamed every now and then, tasting more of her foul footsweat, and breathed in deeply in the reek of her feet.

The stench made you dizzy, as if you were high. Soon enough the sole thing you could think was this putrid smell filling you whole being. And whatever hopes you had burning inside of you were slowly being extinguished, as the heavy smell of Jinx’s feet, took over your conscious.

Soon you began mumbling things. Things you did not even realized yourself at the beginning.
things like:
"Thank you , Mistress Jinx." After each stomp,
Or periodically,
"I love the smell of your feet, mistress jinx."
And even
"Please keep me here forever, Mistress jinx."
You even caught yourself planting kisses at Jin'x sole and taking small licks of it.
You were surprised, but you did not really care. You could not care. Your conscious had almost faded away.

So what happens next: Jinx...
a) Has felt your kissing her foot, and takes you out eventually to reward you
b) Takes you out, saying she needs to blow off some steam. Stomps you relentlessly.
c) Takes you out demanding that you tend to some other part of her body.
1212.title: Makes you her insole

1213.content:
Jinx grins as her toes wriggle like pale snakes above- they were skinny and long, like the rest of her, and she seemed ecstatic to have an indestructible toy to play with. As the smoke from Pow-Pow clears, her massive, pale toes take up your horizon.

"Squish!" She beams as she clenches her toes around you, compacting you into the sweaty, clammy gap between her two biggest toes. She gigles manically as she schrunches up and down your form, trapping you in a fetid, slightly sticky, and unbearably smelly cavern. You feel her drag her toes, and you, through the mud on the rift, smearing it on her digits and your pathetic form as she hums absentmindedly.

"Hmm.. I think.. I'll keep you in my BOOTS!" Jinx declares with a shout, as if she had cracked some discovery. She plucks one of the tattered shoes up from the dirt, scuffed and worn- and proceeds to give you a view you never wanted to see. Her pale foot dangles above the mouth of the tarnished combat boot, revealing a beat-in footprint the size of a lake - and with puddles of sweat to match, you fear. in the dim light below you see five sharp indentations for each of jinx's writhing, sweaty toes, and a crater for the ball of her foot to match. The insole is torn and tattered, worn away by running, stomping, and crushing bugs like you. And you had a front row seat as the miasma of hot foot wafted up, making your eyes water and your nose burn. Jinx -

...with the back of her pants pulled, making room for you next to her ass.

While falling, your body turns fully and you scream as you see Jinx...
122.title: Tossed

1221.content: Your eyes widen as you see Jinx with her mouth open, ready to snatch you up as you descend downwards. Sure enough, you land with a *splat* on Jinx's tongue as she shuts her mouth abruptly, muffling your pleas. Then, you feel your dark surroundings start to shift. The wet, pink muscle beneath you starts to move and shift, coating you in a thick layer of saliva. "Mmmhh, you taste pretty good little guy." says Jinx in somewhat muffled voice, with you in her mouth. The saliva bath continues until you feel yourself be moved to....
1221.title: ...with her mouth wide open, ready to catch you.

12212.content:
Your eyes widen in horror as you turn to see the dark abyss that is Jinx's throat. You attempt to grab onto...something, anything but to no avail. The saliva on and around you is too slick to get a good grip. Onward, Jinx's tongue continues to push you further and further back until you could feel the tips of your feet start to hang over an edge. No matter what pleas you made, Jinx didn't hear them as the Loose Cannon sealed your fate with a...

*GLRK*
*GULP*

As she swallowed, Jinx pressed her finger on her throat to feel you going down. Down, down, down, until you reached her stomach. Meanwhile, as you slithered down Jinx's throat, your head popped through an opening. You body soon followed as you fell inside Jinx's cavernous stomach. It reeked with the smell of acid and curry. Your fall ended with a *plop* of mushy rice. As you got up and reoriented yourself, you could hear giggling from outside.

"Enjoy your stay, little guy,~" said Jinx, patting her stomach, "You're not going anywhere.~" As she continued on with her day, you survey your new surroundings and notice that the mush of rice you're standing on is dissolving. In a few minutes, your safe land will no longer exist.

Will you live what's coming up next?
12212.title: Down The Hatch

122122.content:
More and more of the curry dissolves as the acids start to rise above the mush. It starts to burn away at your shoes and you can do nothing but cry out for mercy. But fate had other ideas, as the curry suddenly gives way and you fall into the acid pool and become submerged. You scour around Jinx's stomach for any sort of "land" to get on, but to no avail. While swim around in panic, the acid works it's way through your skin and now starts on your muscles and nerves. The pain is so unbearable, you feel your arms, legs, and eventually everything else in your body shut down from an overload from the nervous system. Your body tilts down into the acid pool face first as acid starts to enter your body. It only took half an hour until your body was digested and your bones, as well as all your waste, went through Jinx's bowels. On the outside, Jinx was doing great in lane, having made the enemy support disconnect. She then felt something in her bowels. "Oh? are you ready to come out little guy?" she said, looking at her stomach. "Well, let's get you out~." She set down Pow-Pow and dropped her pants right in front of the tower. She squatted down and began to push. A thick, brown log poked out from Jinx's donut as bit by bit, a solid coil of scat plopped on the ground. Jinx, satisfied with her work, pulled up her pants and left to take the enemy's inhibitor. As terrible as it was that you were digested and disposed of, poor Nautilus had to witness Jinx shit in front of a tower.

GAME OVER
122122.title: (SCAT) Bye Bye!

131211.content:
You grit your teeth as Vi set her feet down in front of you. Looking up and seeing how big she was to you, your immediately ruled out running away, at her size she would easily catch up to you. Your only option left was survival, and in order to do that you had to obey this giantess. You approach Vi's feet, there sickening smell quickly overpowers you again, but you press on wards towards the reeking things. You end up face to face with her dirty heel, you were gagging a bit from the smell, you look up and see how big her feet are compared to you, you had no idea on how Vi expected you to clean such huge dirty feet in any reasonable time, it was outrageous!
"Come on I don't have all day!" Vi said, sounding a little ticked off. "You could always just be my insole for the rest of your life!" These words made you shiver you definitely wouldn't survive that. You stick out your tongue and moved your face closer to her warm reeking feet, coughing a little as your nose was just about touching her feet. You took one lick and immediately started to wretch from the taste days worth of sweat and filth filled your mouth, while the unbearable stink attacked your nose. You don't know how much longer you would be able to last as Vi's slave, the smell and taste of her feet alone will kill you, and you don't even know how much harsher it will get if you don't obey her. Not wanting to anger her you go in for another lick, and another one after that. You slowly start to make progress on her feet. The vile stench never improved and the sicking taste didn't go away. In some spots the filth was so ingrained into her sole that mere licking wouldn't suffice, you actually had to bite it off of her foot, and as you would bite into these disgusting lumps of filth, old sweat would start to drip out and into your mouth, adding to the already rancid taste that was permanently in mouth at this point. Hours of this torture go by and you finally find yourself and the worst part of the task, her toes.
"Well,well." you hear Vi say "Looks like you were definitely the right choice for this task! I mean look how clean you made my foot! All that is left are the toes, and whats in-between them." you start to shake, this is not headed anywhere good Vi continues "By this point you must be starved! Why don't we kill two birds with one stone, why don't you just eat all of my toe jam! that why my feet still get clean and you get fed! I will not except no for an answer, so you better eat ALL of it."
You try your best not to puke, this was going too far. You stared at the lumps of toe jam that were in between her toes, the black lumps of goo look completely inedible, and the horrific smell that was being emitted from between her toes beat out anything you have came across before. and to think that she expected you to stick your head in there and EAT all of her toe jam. Tears come to your eyes as your head approaches the depths of her toe cleavage, both from the reek of her feet and from how tired and broken you where at this point.
Your nose burns from the stale reek of foot sweat, the air was think with the stench of feet and sweat you leaned forward to bite the lump of toe jam, your face in pressed into the horrid substance. You take your first bite and just about die. The indescribable taste of weeks and weeks of wearing the same socks with out washing them or her feet. The feeling of the soft, warm, goo fill your mouth with its vile substances was far to much for you to handle you force yourself to swallow it before looking back at the hell hole that was in between Vi's toes.

You weren't sure when how it happened, but when you awoke, you found yourself lying on hard, packed dirt. You struggle to sit up, feeling exhausted and still quite sleepy. You looked about. Something seemed odd about where you were. You couldn't quite put your finger on it for a moment or two. Then you realized... the grass was taller than your head. How did it even take you more than a second to notice that!? You must be groggy alright! You quickly leapt up to your feet, to look around. Bad idea as it turned out.

No sooner had you jumped up, a colossal black boot slammed down in front of you. You let out a shout of alarm and staggered away from it, before your eyes flashed upwards to see who the boot belonged to. Your gaze travelled up, past the tight leather pants, past the daggers on her hips, past her slender but toned (exposed) midriff and momentarily was obstructed by the woman's notably breasts. Finally they managed to hit the woman's face. It was difficult to make out-- the distance was like several miles to you. You could make out long red hair, and glimmering green eyes, staring down at you. Crap. You had accidentally caught her attention! Her mouth was curled into a look of...

145311.content:
You see the crimson-haired giantess smirk in a questionable fashion.

"Well well, what have we here? " Katarina says as she slams her boot in front of your entire field of vision. The slender assassin looks pleased to have a new plaything - and it looks like you're it. Her body, though terrifyingly large, is undeniably attractive. Katarina looks down, eyes glimmering with dark anticipation.
145311.title: Amusement [She sees a new toy to play with]

145312.content:
The woman kneeled down to get a better look at you, her eyes glinting in excitement. "What have we here?" She crooned at you, extending a hand down and nudging you with a forefinger that was wider than your entire torso, knocking you to the ground. A breath escaped her lips as she chuckled softly at how effortlessly she had overpowered you, without even intending to. "Quite a special little bug I've found on the Rift~" She said in a tone that was laden with teasing. Before you even had a chance to stand back up, she easily scooped you up in one hand, bringing her up, past her well curved hips and washboard abdominals, past her considerable breasts and up to her face. "Whatever are you doing here, little bug?" She taunted you, hot breath washing over you like a gust of wind.

"It's dangerous here. Don't you know I could have stepped on you?" Her voice broke off in a low chuckle, her eyes shining down on you, enthralled at her new toy. You try to speak up, but she takes her other finger and pushes it against your face, smothering you for an instant.

"Oh, shhhh." She tells you. "I don't need to hear your reasons. No. Not at all..." Her lips curl into a wicked smirk. "Afterall." She begins. "You're mine now~" You most certainly do not like the tone of her voice as she says it. It's a voice of authority and power. A voice dripping with the intonation of unpleasant things to come. "But I'm afraid we'll have to play later." She determines. "I'll learn everything I have to about you in good time. For now, I'll need to put you away somewhere." She seems to ponder this for a moment, giving you space to look and admire her near perfect form and body. Which you do. You can hardly help yourself. Clearly, the woman put as much time into her appearance as she did into training. Apart from the scars that dotted her body, her skin was flawless and unblemished. A tapestry of beauty and history that should have belonged to a war goddess. And it seemed that the powers that be had granted her a form to match her features. You almost forgot where you were, in the heat of the moment. Until you heard that deadly chuckle once more.

"Did you enjoy your look?" She teased you once more. "I'm glad. Perhaps you've noticed, however, that I am rather lacking in places to put you." You looked again, and indeed, saw few pockets on her outfit. Your eyes travelled up, towards her cleavage. A woman's natural pocket. Katarina laughed then, a sound you thought might have sounded charming, but it was far from. Her laugh sent chills down your spine, and evoked all the images of a lion about to pounce on its prey.

"Oh, not today my little bug. Not today. You have not earned the honor of that..." She said, reaching down with her free hand, and tugging off one of her leather boots. You gulp in apprehension, immediately suspecting where this is going, peering over the edge of the woman's palm. A foot to match the rest of her, it was immaculate and beautiful, with long and slender toes. Quite a woman indeed for even her feet to be so beautiful. It took you a moment, though, but then it hit you. She had been going barefoot in black leather boots with the sun beating down-- Oh no.

This realization hit you at about the same time as the smell wafted up from the woman's foot. At your diminished height, it seemed your senses were greatly enhanced. Or perhaps the smell was just that potent. Your eyes and nose burned, and you staggered back from the edge of her hand, hoping to put anything between you and the scent of feet that had been sweating and walking in hot leather for what must have been hours already. Even Katarina's eyes widened in surprise at the scent, her mouth forming a soft "o" in a half-gasp. Then chuckled again.

"Well, I suppose I'll need to do something about that after my battle today." She jests at you, her eyes gleaming. "Or perhaps you can do something about it, my little bug. I've not had a chance to see how durable you are, so I'll be nice..... for now~" She smirks at you as she pinches your head between her fingers, lifting you up. The pressure is intense, and you try to scream. But although Katarina can see your face contort in pain, your scream is little more than buzzing in her ears. Your face alone, however, is more than enough to garner her amusement. "Maybe you can do something about my awful sweat while you're in there." She mocks you, lowering you towards the ground and then lifting her foot, snatching you between her toes. The smell is overwhelming and the scream of pain you had meant to emit from the crushing pressure of her third and second toes, pinning you between them is completely lost in the choking gags you emit as the scent of smelly, sweaty feet overload your senses. Her skin is soft and delicate to the touch, and overwhelmingly warm. You feel yourself sinking into the hot, sweat coated toeflesh as Kataria squeezes you with her powerful digits. You feel dizzy, as you feel the foot start to move.... and begin to re-enter the boot.

"Bye bye my little bug." Katarina taunts you. "I'll be sure to think up something extra special for you when I get home after this battle." And then her face disappears from sight, and you are swallowed up by the darkness of her boot.
145312.title: Katarina's Delight

1453122.content:
You lost track of the time you spent, trapped in Katarina's boot. Once the battle was underway, you were pummeled relentlessly. The Noxian assassin's soft and velvet-like feet did not seem nearly so yielding or pleasant when they were slamming and crushing into you at what felt like hundreds of miles an hour, with the equivalent mass of a very (VERY) large building. For hours Katarina danced across the rift, spinning and leaping. Her weight shifting from foot to foot, at one moment giving you relief from the crushing pressure, and at other times she would shift entirely up to the ball of her foot, driving what felt like the weight of her entire body atop of you. And that saying nothing of the smell or dampness. Both only grew worse. Katarina had selected boots which fit her perfectly. No additional wiggle room whatsoever, so as to prevent her foot sliding around inside. They were a tight, and perfect fit. The consequence being that the smell could not escape them until she removed her foot. Leather was not the most breathable of materials, and so the reeking stink and boiling heat only raised. There was a point at which all you could do was squeeze your eyes shut to avoid the smell from burning them. But there was nothing you could do for your nose, as the pungent odor scoured your nostrils. To call it pungent though was an understatement, for you had never experienced anything like this. You'd experienced some bad smells in your life. Who hasn't? But never had you experienced the scent of an assassin's foot while it was still inside such a horrid boot, in mid-battle, sweat streaming off of it, and to make matters worse, you were acutely aware that your sense of smell had indeed been intensified.

The sweat itself nearly drowned you several times. You suspected, with what little processing power your mind had beyond reeling at the wretched stink and pressure, that the opposing team must have had a Brand or Annie present, for there were several moments when the heat spiked immensely, and sweat flowed even more profusely. You were certain you must have been sweating yourself, but it was impossible to say, drenched in Katarina's. And this sweat lubricated your body. As the hours dragged on, you began to slip out from the crushing grip of her toes, your damp form sliding across the slippery, sweat coated footflesh. Katarina was far more focused on the battle-- on evading the blows of her adversaries and dealing back in turn, to leave any focus on the little bug she had found at the start of the match. You tried to issue a cry as you slowly but surely began to slip beneath the scarlet haired assassin's perfect soles, but, your throat scorched by the smell inside her boots, you could issue little more than a croak. You felt her feet fly off the ground, as, in the world of the normal sized beings, Katarina sprang into her Shunpo technique to attack. Helpless to resist, you slipped beneath the ball of Katarina's foot as she landed, her entire body weight crushing down on you. Death. Sweet release from this hell. You were ready for it now, feeling the hundreds, no thousands, maybe even millions of tons that was Katarina's weight all come crushing down on you. You felt your chest compress, and felt your body flatten beneath her weight.

But you did not die.

In the instant, this new horror of your situation began to set in, Katarina began her Death Lotus, spinning rapidly in place. Spinning on the ball of her foot. The same foot that was crushing you. Unable to move. Unable to scream. Unable to do anything but stare into the blackness, and endure the pressure as the Assassin's foot ground you into the insole of her boot, plastering you to her sweat-soaked sole like little more than a sticker. You mentally prayed for release. For mercy. But there was none. Katarina, for the time being, had forgotten you had even existed, and, had she known, the cruel Noxian would likely have found your situation to be positively hysterical, rather than offer any form of help. Katarina had a streak of malice a mile wide. She was unquestionably the worst person you could possibly have run afoul of.
1453122.title: A dark and sweaty hell

choices: You're going to be stuck to her sole for a loooong time...
She finds a way to remove you from her foot
14531222.content:
You did not know how long the battle continued after that. You wished you could say that was because you had passed out. But that was not so. Whatever horrid enchantment had made you this size, in addition to preventing your easy demise, seemed to prevent you losing consciousness as well. You were forced to endure every second of the time you spent in the stinking boot of Katarina, the Sinister Blade. But the battle must have ended at some point, for eventually you felt Katarina move into an easier pace. She had ceased her continual running, and leaping about. Her pace was even now. Walking. The battle must have been over. So why... why did it feel even hotter now? You heard Katarina's distant voice, cursing above. She seemed extremely displeased with something, though you did not know what. Then she stopped. Her weight pressed down upon you.

"Oh! I almost forgot about you, little bug." You could make out. "I hope I didn't crush you flat during the battle." She said, her tone hardly sounding concerned. Almost.... mocking, albeit with a note of disappointment at the idea she had lost her victim. You felt the weight lift off of you, completely, and you realized Katarina must have sat down. You felt motion again, as she took the boot off. And then you finally saw light! But fate, it seemed, was a cruel mistress (though not nearly as cruel as your captor), for the light you had thought would bring you some measure of solace did anything but. If anything, it filled you with dread.

Sand.

That was what you saw. An ocean of sand, beneath you, and as Katarina set her foot down, sole facing out to inspect her toes and look for you, you saw it stretched out for miles in all directions. You realized, with a small measure of horror, that you were in a desert. That certainly explained why it had gotten hotter, at least. But it meant that Katarina's feet, the same feet to which you found yourself plastered, would only get hotter and sweatier and... gulp... smellier, as time went on. Not less. You were snapped out of your horror, by Katarina's voice.

"Damn. He's not here. He must have slipped out from between my toes during the match." She hissed, and you saw her move her boot, inspecting it. Katarina tried to look inside, but quickly thought better of it, catching a tiny whiff of the smell you had been forced to endure for what had felt like hours. "Ooof... if he's even still alive in here." She commented, turning the boot upside down and shaking it to see if anything would come out. Of course, you didn't, and this only increased Katarina's frustration. "Where is he...?" She asked, and then turned her foot to check her sole, to see if she could find you.

You expected her to find you nearly instantly. Instead, she merely squinted at her sole for a moment.... then you saw a spark of recognition in her eyes. She'd seen you! ....And she began to laugh, that same chilling, mocking laugh you'd heard before. But she quickly found herself unable to stop. Tears entered Katarina's eyes as she laughed harder and harder. She released her foot so she could hold her stomach, laughing and stomping a foot (the one you were stuck to of course) into the sand in hysterics. After several moments she seemed to compose herself and lifted her foot again. "Well, well, it seems you had quite an adventure, didn't you little bug?" She teased you, pulling out a knife and sliding it in front of her foot so you could see your reflection. A gasp of horror emitted from you, and you realized why Katarina had taken a moment to find you. The events of the battle had crushed you completely flat. You were little more than a sticker, pasted just below the ball of the Noxian assassin's foot. You blended in nearly seamlessly with her sole, in fact even staring at yourself, it became hard to see where your body ended and the assassin's foot began.

Katarina chuckled some more, and filled you in, as she drank in your terror. "As you can see, the Institute's mages did not return me to my home of Noxus as I'd hoped." She said, with disdain in her voice. "Someone seems to have screwed up and dropped us off in Shurima." But then she smirked again. "So I'm afraid I certainly won't be able to wash my feet off anytime soon little bug..." She said, lightly tapping her foot against the sands of Shurima, pressing you down each time. "But it's good to know you and my feet have gotten to know each other so well~" She taunted you. "I might be inclined to leave you with them for awhile more then, since you're now so close~"
14531222.title: No mercy for the helpless

choices: Katarina decides to see if you can survive being eaten
Katarina decides she wants you to care for her feet
145312222.content:
After some deliberation, during which Katarina made sure to slowly grind the foot you were stuck to, she ultimately decided to free you from the underside of her foot. Afterall, she could always put you back there, anytime she wanted to. She smiled wickedly at you, and pressed her foot into the sands of Shurima. "Now hold still little bug.... This will only hurt a lot." She said, gleefully, as she vigorously twisted her bare, sweaty foot back and forth into the Shuriman sands. The rough sands pulled and teared at you, causing you incredible pain, but slowly began to rip you off the assassin's foot, grain by grain. Finally, Katarina, finished the job, reaching out and peeling you off her foot.

"I see you're much more durable than I gave you credit for, little bug." She said. You struggled to regain your voice, while Katarina's piercing gaze held you, and she continued speaking. "I'm glad~ It means I'll get to try out all sorts of things on you." She said with a sinister tone in her voice, and she licked her lips. You finally found your voice and began to rasp out your protests, but your throat was still scorched from the time you'd spent in her boots, and Katarina could not hear a word you said. "Trying to talk, little bug? I'm afraid you'll have to speak up." She taunted. "But that's alright. I don't need to hear what you have to say." She dropped you onto a nearby stone and pinned you down with one toe-- and her little toe at that, crushing your abdominals and below with ease. The familiar scent of her feet stung your nostrils as Katarina looked down on you with a gleam in her eye, and a few beads of sweat, that were less beads to you, and more like the amount of water you'd find in a city fountain, splashed over your face, soaking you in Katarina's foot scent. You retched as more than a little of the scent flowed into your mouth and down your throat.

"Do you not like that?" She mocked. "Well I'm afraid, so far from home, my feet won't be smelling any better anytime soon, my little bug." She smirked at you. "Not unless a little bug was willing to help..." You blanced in terror as Katarina lifted her foot off of you. You tried to scramble up, but it seemed that although the damage to your lower body was not to be permanent, it was enough to keep you down. Katarina had effectively crushed you with nothing more than her little toe. It was humiliating. Katarina hovered her foot over you. You could see filthy toejam had begun to form between her toes, sand coated the bottom of her sole, and it literally shone with sweat. "While we're here, I may as well get a rest from that battle. And while I rest, you can clean my feet, since you so desperately want to get rid of their smell." She teased.

"Or...." She began, looking down at you devilishly. "Maybe instead, I can test just how durable you are. You survived all that time under my feet. Not a small accomplishment~ If the pressure didn't kill you, the smell certainly should have." She taunted. "So perhaps we can test it another way.... A way I'm sure I'll enjoy but you certainly won't..." She said, stroking a finger across her belly as she said so, and licking her lips in anticipation as she stared down at you, deliberating your fate.
145312222.title: Out of one fire and into another

1453122222.content:
Katarina shot you a wicked smirk. You gave a dry gulp in fear of what was to come, as she flexed her toes, brushing your face with them and scraping sand, sweat and grit off of them onto your face. "I think I've made my choice, little bug." She told you. "Much as I'd love to feel you squirming inside my belly..." She began, rubbing her belly, and snapping her teeth at you threateningly. "After all that time you've spent marinating in my boot, you'd probably taste absolutely disgusting. You get to live another day. At least until I find something to wash you off first."

"Oh.... Joy." You grumble back at her, finding so many issues with her tone like you should be grateful to her for this. Like the fact that eating you would be more of an inconvenience to her. Katarina's looks were stunning, but you were quickly getting over that in the wake of her sheer malice towards you.

"Of course the first chance I get, I'll be sure to test how well you handle my digestive system." She warned you. "But maybe I can be persuaded otherwise. Who knows~ I might even be willing to help you." Now she had your attention. You almost weren't sure if it was simply false hope she was giving you, to take away later, but you'd take it. She said that she'd be willing to help you! ...Maybe. The scarlet assassin didn't miss your reaction, small as you were and she gave a deep, throaty chuckle. "Well, you've got to do something for me first. And that...." As she spoke, she lifted up her sole, which was now covered in a fine layer of sand. "Is to clean my feet." She declared.

You stared up at the monolithic behemoth of a foot that towered above you. Katarina's feet, although normally dainty and fairly small, loomed above like skyscrapers. Cleaning them could take you hours! But her cold eyes told you, you had little choice in the matter. If you ever wanted to go back to your normal size, you'd need her cooperation. Slowly, apprehensively, you approached Katarina's sweaty sole. The smell was not as bad as it had been in her boot, now that the desert air was around to help diffuse it. But that didn't mean it was perfect. Your eyes watered as you approached her soles and you slowly began to rub the sand away. Katarina's chuckle met your ears.

"Not like that, little ant." She said. "You're not showing your master proper devotion. I want you to use your tongue to clean my feet. And add a few kisses in there for good measure. I'll let you decide how many. Just keep in mind, the more devotion you show to your master, the more likely I am to be merciful with you." She added with a deadly smirk, her eyes glittering with amusement. You grit your teeth and began your work, and gave Katarina's sand coated heel the first lick. The taste stung your mouth and you nearly vomited, doubling over and giving several heaving motions as you struggled to keep the contents of your stomach down.

"I didn't say stop!" Katarina snapped. You grudgingly returned to your task. The second lick of her foot was almost as bad as the first, and the salty taste of her sweat overwhelmed your taste buds. But you trudged on through the humiliating task, literally licking Katarina's feet clean. Lick by lick, centimeter by centimeter. Katarina's mirth was palpable, as she wiggled her toes in glee above your head, at the torment she was putting you through. You didn't forget to kiss her sole, either beginning each new section with several kisses, which Katarina appeared to approve of. Cleaning her foot this way, it took nearly an hour just to clean the bottom of her heel, despite trying as fast as you could. Every time Katarina scrunched her toes above you, sweat dripped off of them, splashing onto your head and forcing you to your knees as though you were worshipping her foot. The Noxian woman giggled at this, and your pitiful progress.

"Well, well, well. Aren't you a motivated one. You actually did better than I thought." She said, dropping her foot back down. Unfortunately, she dropped it down on top of you, crushing you under her sole. You felt her sole scraping above you, rolling you up to her toes.

"But I've waited an hour, and you're not even close to finished. Not that I expected someone like you to accomplish this. But for that lovely devotion you showed my soles, I'll give you one more chance." Suddenly you found yourself in the shade as Katarina's gigantic hand reached over you.... And then her finger pressed your face deep between her toes. Right, face first into the fresh, grimy toejam you had seen forming earlier. It was awful. A marshy, swampy stink that completely enveloped your face. You swore you were getting light headed, but that went away, replaced by cold horror when you heard Katarina's next line.

"Eat it."

It was not a request. Not a challenge. Not a cutesy little "If you don't eat this, I won't help you." It wasn't even a demand. It was an order. An irrefutable order. This wasn't just bossing you around. The tone didn't have any amusement in it. Katarina was showing you the difference between you and her. An immeasurable difference, that you didn't have a prayer of refusing her command. Her edicts. She wasn't your master. She was your goddess. And as you realized this, something inside you broke. With tears welling in your eyes... you obeyed her, and began to eat away at the disgusting substance that covered your face. Katarina felt this and gave you a wicked smile.

"That's it. Hmm... I suppose I should come up with something to name you. Bug? Speck? Toejam? Afterall, you are what you eat." She declared mockingly. You tried to block her out, tried to block out what it was you were doing, with each chewy, disgusting mouthful. After only a few minutes, the space between Katarina's toes was clear, and you were pretty certain you were about to be sick.

"Don't you dare throw that up." Katarina warned you. "You're going to digest it. It's part of you. Part of who you are. Besides, you'd better get used to the taste. Afterall... I have ten toes." She purred. Your face, if it wasn't pale enough already, lost even more color at this declaration. You would have stumbled back, but Katarina's toes held you like a vice. They lifted you up, hovering you above her boot. You swore you could see the smell trying to escape the boot like steam. Wafting right up in your face. Katarina's edict that you not expel the toejam you had just eaten, and the fear of what she would do if you disobeyed, kept you from hurling, but only just. As Katarina slowly lowered you back into the warm, sweaty, smelly darkness that awaited you, you heard her grant you one last order.

"Have this foot cleaned up by my next break, alright? If you do..." She just flashed you a deadly smile, not finishing her sentence. And then she was gone, as her foot swallowed up all the light in her boot, and you were back in that sauna. Even in the darkness, you could feel her powerful toes wrap and bind you, like great, powerful pythons. You wanted to weep. Instead, you miserably began to feel your way between the toes to begin your next meal....
1453122222.title: Your sole snack

You hear the slamming sound of the bandle gunner shake the ground as she rocket jumps to land nearby. Her purple toes are frighteningly near as she wipes her brow - "Can't wait to tell the recruits about that one!"

Suddenly -
145331.title: Tristana

choices: ...her mouth. "It might not be very dry, but at least it's safe!"
...the back of her cargo pants. "Don't think too hard about it, pipsqueak."
1453311.content:
Suddenly, the gigantic Yordle aims her huge round eyes in your direction!

"Whoa! What have we here?"

She bends down towards you, looking even bigger! You couldn't be any bigger than a tiny ant to her!

"Don't think I've ever seen anything like you before, little guy!"

You start backing away fearfully, this gargantuan looming girl is the most terrifying thing you've ever seen! She notices you turning to run and reaches out for you.

"Oh no you don't."

You begin to run at full speed away from her, but soon feel her giant fingers wrap around your puny form. You are lifted high above the ground at breakneck speed! You barely manage to hang on to consciousness as you fly upward. As soon as your vision stops spinning, you are met with her enormous building-sized face! You let out a tiny yelp of surprise before struggling against her grip.

"Hey! Stop squirming would ya! I don't wanna drop you," her voice thunders, "This isn't a safe place for a little guy like you to be. We can talk later, but I gotta get you out of here for now."

In the distance, you hear roars, gunfire, and other strange noises from behind a forest of trees. A few of them begin to topple and rustle as something potentially bigger and scarier approaches!

"Whoops! Looks like I'm not out of the woods yet! I gotta put you somewhere safe real quick! You'll thank me later!"

With that she dangles you over...
1453311.title: She notices you.

choices: "...put you back in my mouth for the time being."
"...eat you, and get whatever luck you have."
"...shove you down my pants, it should be more comfortable and just as safe."
14533111.content:
You really didn't get much say in the matter, as the yordle gunner releases her grip on you and your tiny body falls directly on top of her pink tongue. She shuts her mouth and you become enveloped by darkness. As soon as that happened, your new surroundings start to shake as you can only guess that Tristana started running. As she ran, her tongue moved you around inside her mouth. You're quickly slathered in a bath of saliva, as you move from being wrapped in her tongue to being pressed against her cheeks. This continued for a while until your surroundings start shaking less and less.

Eventually, the shaking stopped entirely as Tristana's mouth opens and grabs your tiny body. She asks; "You okay there, small-fry?"
"Y-Yes, I'm fine."
"That's good to hear." She chuckles then says, "Y'know, that was a real nasty predicament I was in there, a 3v1. But, while I had you in there, I felt...unstoppable. I pulled off maneuvers no had even seen before and got myself a triple kill." She pauses, then continues; "Look, I'm not sure where you came from but there's another matchup coming up soon and you seem to be lucky. So, I'll..."
14533111.title: Tristana's Mouth

Are starting to shrink again but manage to stay between her toes
1453312.content: As Tristana stood there you figured it would be best for you to hitch a ride on her since she is the only one nearby to help you. So without giving it a second thought you run right towards the spot in between her toes where you find part of her toeless legwear. You then try to get a good grip on the material so you won't fall off if she starts moving. So as your ant sized self was secure between Tristana's toes she begins to run. So far it seems you are able to hold on even though this Yordle is still running and you still manage to hold on even during a rocket jump. After a while you...
1453312.title: At the toes of a Yordle

choices: You're stuck fast... the torture continues!
Squirm, struggle, scream! See if you can escape this prison!
14533122.content:
As you brace for impact during another jarring rocket jump and a crashing landing, you begin to feel.. odd. More than just the faint smell of yordle footsweat getting to your head. Your body starts to dwindle, the material of the legwear growing larger and larger with each second. Your handholds in the material begin to slip, too large for your fingers to get around. Luckily, you don't seem to be shrinking all that much. Unluckily, you seem to be in danger of falling, and as the purple toes slam into the dirt of the rift after another successful jump, that's exactly what you do. Your hands slip from the material, but you aren't a splat just yet- Your last motion is to throw your weight towards the toes, and slip between the leather strap and the bare purple toes.
The strap opens like a hungry mouth before snapping back to it's place, pinning you firmly against Tristana's toecrotch. That's when your journey really takes a turn for the worst. You never thought about this, but it makes sense that bare leather on hot skin in the heat of battle would make for some unfortunate results. Dirt from the rift mixed with a truly surprising amount of perspiration here, creating a disgusting mix of toejam all sealed inside by the leather strap. And you had a front row seat to the whole show, as the strap tenses, the warm, wet gunk accepting you into itself like a nightmare quicksand. Your nose burns, your eyes start to water, and the sticky gunk pins you to the glistening purple toeflesh as Tristana recalls. Your struggles tickle, but not quite enough to get the Gunner's attention as she points to the taller items in the shop, baking you into her toejam all while new sweat forms and rolls down your tiny body. It was not going to get better.
14533122.title: Are starting to shrink again but manage to stay...

choices: No help comes, so you suffer for the match
A rocket jump manages to shake you free
You shrink even more, it is not your day
145331221.content:
It felt like being buried in liquid cement and smelt like you were crammed in a trash compactor. The leather tightly trapping you in the rank crevice of Tristana's toes also helped to tightly compact you with the thick gunk that had previously built up during the match. Even worse, as Tristana began to make her way back into the game the stirrup began tightening and shifting along with the movement and flexing of her rank bare foot. What this really did was force your body even more tightly into the foot flesh squeezing copious amounts of the rotten foot sweat onto your essentially toe jam bound body.


It was then you realized something even more horrifying. As Tristana battled against Missfortune, dodging and weaving as she blasted her massive cannon, she began kicking up and swallowing more dirt and filth between and under her foot. What this meant for you was that, as you were pressed into the smey toe cleavage by her meager footcovering, more dirt was being swallowed into the gaping maw of leather heat and sweat. Slowly the buildup began to form, but this time behind you. And as leather flakes and sweat began to merge with the filthy foot sweat that now burned your eyes, nose, and mouth with its salty pungency, more and more toe jam was forming behind you. You could feel the gooey thickness taking form and realized that you were now not just surrounded by the thick jammy filth, but were now becoming encased in it.


You could have cried but instead chose to scream, which was when the real torture began. As soon as you opened your mouth the disgusting gooey substance forced its way into your mouth, desperate to escape somewhere in the tight squishy confines of the leather toe prison. The taste was unlike anything you had experienced. Like you could taste every part of the map from the filthy mud of the river to the trampled foot paths of mid and bot all fused with the bitter taste of the sweat from each ponding step the tiny yordle girl during the whole match. In other words, an unfathomable foot hell in edible (debatably) form. And it just wouldn't stop filling your mouth to the point you could no longer chew. So you only had to writhe and squirm and scream into the filth praying for freedom, lest you would have to wait for the mouthful of toe jam to dissolve in your saliva before you would be free of it.
145331221.title: In a jam

145332.content: Keeping with the yordle theme, how about poppy?
145332.title: No thank you.

1453321.content:
You groggily get to your feet in a strange new land- you recognize it, slowly but surely - This is Summoner's Rift! Top lane, to be specific... and you were hardly the size of an ant.

This revelation is cut short, however, by the thudding of massive leather boots above, shaking the ground as you gulp to reveal a yordle- Poppy, running into lane with a massive hammer.

She blows a wisp of white hair out of her eyes and comes to a stop, spraying dirt over your tiny form. You can see her boot wriggle as she taps her toes impatiently, voice booming above absentmindedly.

"I sure do a lot of walking.."
1453321.title: Hammer!

choices: stash you in my boot, sorry it might be bad in there."
put you down he back of my armor, you should be cushioned!"
drop you between my breasts, don't squirm to much okay?"
14533212.content:
You panic as the titanic boot of the small girl begins it's walking pattern again. A walking pattern that unfortunately would put you right into the ground. You try and make a break for it only to trip on the piles of dirt she kicked up from her sudden stop. Looking up at the leather boot coming down you scream in panic and fear.

Luckily it seems her short stature placing her close to the ground was to your benefit because the foot came to a stop and pulled back allowing you to stare up and the yordle knight, who was in turn, staring down at you. It was hard to read her expression at first but it became clear after a moment that it was a look of wonder. That was a relief, well until you watched her reach down and wrap a fist around you.

You squirmed to break free from the small hand but found no such luck as she brought you up to her face. Her smile turned from that of wonder to that of a joy you weren't quite sure you liked. You pushed against her hand one more time to try and break free but were still met with failure which meant you were now at this girls mercy, not a good thing.

"You're so tiny, there was no way I would have seen you if you didn't yell like that. It isn't safe out here for someone of your size. Let your big friend Poppy keep you safe! That sounded pretty hero like." She said making sure to add the last bit quietly to herself as if psyching herself up. You felt yourself calm down a bit realizing that Poppy isn't really a bad person so you were likely fine. Well that was until she added the next part.

"I have to win this lane for my team so I'll have to...
14533212.title: Too late- she's seen you!

choices: Play the duration of the match with Poppy
After the match Poppy tries to help
After the match Poppy likes you there and wants to keep you
145332121.content:
Not good. This was not good. You began trying to pry yourself from the yordle girls fist but were obviously making no headway. She barely seemed to notice in fact as she sat in the dirt and used her free hand to crack the seal of her leather boots around her feet. A small bust of hot air hit you even at your elevated position which didn't help to quell your fears in any way. Finally the bare foot was bulled from the inside revealing a small foot maybe slightly taller than you. The sole was slick and greasy with sweat and the gaps of the toes seemed to have small deposits of gooey toe jam. If you weren't terrified before you were downright petrified now.

"Hang on little guy, this match will be over with in no time. Until then just hold your breath or something because I wont lie this won't be fun for you. As soon as it's over though I can help you figure out how to help ya!" She said cheerfully as if she wasn't about to lock you in a coffin of foot stench. You knew it was useless to struggle and yet you couldn't help yourself. Anywhere but in there would have been fine. Slowly she began to lower you towards her boot as the air got more and more muggy and the stench of rotting dairy got stronger and stronger. Finally the fist unclenched as you went plummeting into the dark depths of her boot.

You landed on the insole of the boot with a wet squish as hot sweat splashed onto your body covering you in the disgusting liquid and blinding you with the salty fluid. You tried to rub it from your face only to smear more of the smelly sweat and some grime you had accidentally gotten stuck to your hand. No matter what you tried to do you couldn't escape the fetid scent of her feet, and as if it wasn't bad enough suddenly all light faded as her pudgy foot soon filled out the inside of her boot, kicking you over and pressing you between her sweltering hot foot and the squishy insole beneath you. You screamed into the salty foot flesh as Poppy nodded to herself and began dashing into lane battering you with her stinky foot thinking of how she would help you after this long match.
145332121.title: Heavy Like A Hammer

choices: "...I'm sorry for putting you through that. But..."
"...why is your thingy so big?" (Foot Fetish Route)
1453321213.content:
Over the course of the match, your body was flipped around, forcing you to experience both sides of the ‘fresh’ foot sandwich you were in the middle of. When you were forced into the worn-down footwear, and the bright bluish ped lowered down to squash you into the insole, your legs were pushed apart, leaving you spread eagle against the soft foot flesh. The damp toes wiggled in your face. They were almost taunting you, daring you to attempt escape, knowing that it was a useless endeavor that would only leave you even further in their clutches.

When the Yordle girl took her first step with you inside, your head was pushed deeply into the embrace of her toe arches, moistening your face with hints of salty perspiration, already present from her run to lane. While your body was trampled, your position was ever so slightly changed; your clothes were twisted and torn, allowing the heft of Poppy’s sole to rub against your bare skin. Luckily, the slickness of the pudgy foot flesh prevented you from getting rug burns; instead, you were gradually coated in a layer of her sudor, swamping you with her sour smell. Though you closed your mouth—not eager to introduce your tongue to anyone’s feet, much less the giant, reeking, sweaty beasts before you—the one thing you couldn’t mitigate was the smell. You held your breath in a desperate bid to avoid the inevitable, but eventually, you had to get air.

Like a gas junkie sniffing gasoline, you huffed the strong, heady odor of Poppy’s foot straight from the source. You couldn’t help but gag, your lungs soiled by the cheesy musk. Unfortunately for you, this little slip-up meant that the surplus of sweat she worked up was primed to leak down into your helpless little throat. The second you opened your mouth, it was met with the burning taste of freshly-excreted sweat, the spongy flesh pushing its way into your mouth. The salty liquid poured into your yap by the gallon, and even though you woke up with a moderate thirst, you’d much rather be parched than have it be quenched by some girl’s toe sweat. You tried to spit it out, but that only forced it deeper, guaranteeing that you’d be savoring the aftertaste for the rest of the day.

This torment continued on as the stout Yordle played out her lane, working up a sweat all the while.

---

Poppy was in the middle of catching Mundo off guard, when suddenly, Kha’Zix leapt out at her; thinking quickly, she grabbed Orlon’s Hammer in both hands, tilted on one foot, and smashed it into the ground, knocking both of the enemy champions all the way back to their tower. Then, she decided to recall back to base, standing still in a bush.

---

In an instant, your body was crushed by a terrible pressure, the air was crushed out of your lungs, and your face was shoved into a dirty, squishy toe crevice. Was your ‘savior’ putting all her weight onto the one foot you were under?! Ugh, she was probably holding that huge-looking hammer, too…

Oh god, she still wasn’t lifting her foot! Your face was going blue and your eyes were bulging out of your skull; you couldn’t survive this much longer. Even if it smells terrible in here, breathing this muggy fog in is better than dying!

Suddenly, the weight was lifted off your battered body, and the foot that dominated your senses was lifted up into the air. Before you could even think about what you were doing, you inhaled sharply, your nose buried deep in the filthy webbing between her second and third toe. A spicy, putrid, and utterly horrendous cocktail of cheddar, vinegar, and toejam surged through your nostrils and was shot directly to your brain, pure and undiluted. An electric shock spread throughout your body, and you let out an involuntary scream, your senses overloaded by the intensely putrid stench of her beat-up peds. Your jaw slacked and you hyperventilated, no longer able to control your breath after that horrific experience; the stench now passed over your lips and through your gums, gifting your tongue with an olfactory assault that shocked you further into a stupor. The filth between her toes ever so slightly made its way into your mouth, adding a zesty punch to the briny odor infecting your body. All you could do was suck in more breaths full of her potent stench in the hopes that there was enough oxygen to keep you conscious…

---

Poppy was having a blast top lane; even with his cleavers, Mundo didn’t stand a chance against her or her hammer—hero’s hammer, Poppy. Don’t forget your mission! Aw, whatever! He didn’t even get close to killing her! His flames did kind of heat me up, though…

Oh! That reminded her! How’s the little guy doing in my boot? It’s probably terrible in there, but the whole ‘fighting other people who are trying to kill you’ thing didn’t exactly leave her a lot of options on where to put him.

At first, she felt pretty bad about stuffing you into her footwear, but as time went on, and her feet got sore, she noticed how comfortable you felt under her hot, tired sole. Your body cushioned her foot completely; it was almost like the boot you were in was brand new! Of course, it wasn’t nearly the same experience for you, being flattened like a pancake and covered in her filth. She supposed that you and her aching feet should take a breather, though.

Putting distance between herself and the shopkeeper, Poppy pops off her 'unoccupied' boot, and pulls her foot out into the open. She cringed at the smell, knowing that it must be a hundred times worse for you. That didn't stop her from secretly enjoying the feeling of your form underneath her, though...

Biting the bullet, she pulls off the boot you're in. Being under her sweaty, sticky soles for so long essentially glued you to them, your body coming along with the foot and into the relatively cool open air. You gasp for breath, your atmosphere still tinged with the smack of her sweat, but at this point you couldn't be happier for a mouthful of something other than sweat, whether liquid or mist.

Your 'savior' stared at the bottom of her foot for a second, taking in the mesmerizing sight of you plastered to her sole. Some weird, tingly feeling ran down her spine, and her thoughts drifted to what would happen if she just kept you under her sole like this forever...

Gah! NO, Poppy! You're supposed to be a hero! Don't give in to temptation... she scolded herself, feeling guilty about her lack of consideration for you. Hnngh...but it feels so good...

Finally regaining enough oxygen to use your voice, you pushed your head away from the sweaty Yordle toes that made your life hell and shout, "H-hey! Could you get me off your foot?!"

"O-oh! Right!" she replies, grabbing you gently by your shoulder and slowly peeling you off of her sole. It takes a bit; you were really stuck deep in there. She eventually laid you down on the ground, being careful not to put too much force on your body.

"WHY THE HELL DID YOU PUT ME IN YOUR BOOT?!"
